name: Roy Tang
text: Also, I don't think being paid to be an influencer is a gray area (legally), as promoting something for money is not in and of itself illegal. Though it is probably more ethical to disclose that you are being paid

source_obj.text: Also, I don't think being paid to be an influencer is a gray area (legally), as promoting something for money is not in and of itself illegal. Though it is probably more ethical to disclose that you are being paid
